RegJSParser

Parsing the JavaScript’s RegExp in JavaScript.

Installation

bash npm install regjsparser

Usage

```js var parse = require(‘regjsparser’).parse;

var parseTree = parse(‘^a’); // /^a/ console.log(parseTree); ```

Testing

To run the tests, run the following command:

bash npm test

To create a new reference file, execute…

bash node test/update-fixtures.js

…from the repo top directory.
